content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in ragusa on november 22 2010 the case is identified as number 985 but no further details about the parties or the case itself are provided both the plaintiff and the defendant have incurred costs with the plaintiff incurring costs of euro 3735 and the defendant incurring costs of euro 1800 the concept of setoff is being considered which means that these costs may be offset against each other the court has made a final decision regarding the division of a property between two parties referred to as plaintiff ag and defendant arga ag is assigned a groundfloor premises measuring 28 sqm while arga is assigned a neighboring building consisting of a ground floor slab and a flat arga is also ordered to pay an excess amount of euro 37500 to ag within one month additionally the court orders the sale of a plot of land with a base price of euro 29190 located in a specific district and the proceeds from the sale will be divided equally between the parties the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the estate with each party responsible for their proportionate share the courts decision was made on november 18 2010 in ragusa the dispute in question involves two parties ag and arga who are the daughters of the deceased person the inheritance includes three properties a groundfloor premises a building consisting of a ground floor and solar pavement and a plot of land the courtappointed expert determined that the properties can be easily divided and it is in the best interest of both parties to assign the properties if the parties cannot agree on the division the property can be sold at auction and the proceeds will be divided equally among the parties the costs of the proceedings will be paid by the estate the court has ordered that the groundfloor premises be assigned to arga and that a sale auction be conducted for the plot of land in front of the building the proceeds from the sale will be divided equally between the parties after deducting expenses the court has also determined that the costs of the proceedings will be shared between the parties based on their respective shares the decision was made on november 18 2010
